about_the_game:
Bounce your way to victory in Elasticritters!, the dynamic, fast-paced precision platformer that will challenge your skills and keep you on the edge of your seat. Enter a vibrant world where adorable, squishy critters have learnt to navigate by bouncing due to their rotund nature.



Embark on a journey through over 120 unique stages, each filled with exhilarating jumps and daring stunts. Master the balance between precision and speed to achieve the quickest times. Face challenges of varying difficulty, all featuring distinctive obstacles and stunning, stylish visuals that make every moment pop.

FEATURES:
  • Choose from more than 8 adorably chubby critters
  • Discover hidden unlockables and secrets as you play!
  • Earn top ranks with the intricate performance-based ranking system
  • Show off your skills with super-charged power-ups and abilities!
  • Groove to the cute and catchy 8-bit style soundtrack



Navigate perilous situations and master challenging obstacles using the power of boost bounces. Conquer a series of intricate, mind-bending puzzles that will put your reflexes and adaptability to the ultimate test.



Engage in epic local multiplayer face-offs across a range of exciting modes, including the fast-paced Race and the strategic Capture the Flag. Prove your prowess and outwit your opponents in adrenaline-pumping, high-stakes showdowns.

Hop into the fun and see if you have what it takes to master the art of the bounce!

Embark on a journey through over 120 unique stages, each filled with exhilarating jumps and daring stunts. Master the balance between precision and speed to achieve the quickest times. Face challenges of varying difficulty, all featuring distinctive obstacles and stunning, stylish visuals that make every moment pop.

  • Groove to the cute and catchy 8-bit style soundtrack



Navigate perilous situations and master challenging obstacles using the power of boost bounces. Conquer a series of intricate, mind-bending puzzles that will put your reflexes and adaptability to the ultimate test.



Engage in epic local multiplayer face-offs across a range of exciting modes, including the fast-paced Race and the strategic Capture the Flag. Prove your prowess and outwit your opponents in adrenaline-pumping, high-stakes showdowns.

Hop into the fun and see if you have what it takes to master the art of the bounce!

name: Elasticritters!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (or AMD Radeon R7 250)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (or AMD Radeon RX 560)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible

short_description: Elasticritters!, the dynamic, fast-paced precision platformer filled with daring jumps and wild stunts. Hone your skills and see if you have what it takes to master this exhilarating bouncy adventure!
